title: Did 'Community Events' just get spammed?
body: I'm seeing korean letters and numbers and whatnot.....did we just get spammed?

replies.body: It was spammed again 10 mins ago, some form of random advertising i'd assume (the one i saw was in korean and said something about asian casinos) (i don't really know much korean as i am only starting to learn it)

Yeah I saw it too.
dont know wtf it was
